alert.note: Alert for Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 23 at 1:50PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Sierra County through 215 PM MDT... At 150 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hermosa, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hermosa and Portions of the Aldo Leopold Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Black Range Foothills; Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range
